skills.skill: Integrations with Identity products for enabling SSO

duties_responsibilities.duty: Deliver Oracle Cloud Applications Security & Controls implementations and Risk Management Cloud (RMC) modules
Assess, design and implement Security and Controls
Design implementation, testing and deploying of Business process controls, automated controls, and IT controls
Implementing out of the box HDL tool, application package migration tools
Implement segregation of duty frameworks and associated mitigating controls and SOD tools
Implement RMC modules including Advanced Access Controls (AAC), Advanced Financials Controls (AFC) and Financial Reporting Controls (FRC)
Integrate with Identity products for enabling SSO

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Computer Engineering, or related discipline (Master's preferred)
